meanings.definition: In or to every place or part; everywhere.
meanings.sent1: The ants were crawling everwhere in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: She searched everwhere for her missing keys.
meanings.sent3: The kids played hide-and-seek, hiding everwhere they could fit.
meanings.sent4: The music echoed everwhere in the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The snowflakes fell everwhere, covering the ground in white.

meanings.sent1: The sweet scent of flowers filled the garden everwhere.
meanings.sent2: The stars shone everwhere in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit appear everwhere except in the hat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang everwhere, bringing joy to all who heard.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread wafted everwhere, making everyone hungry.
